name: spaghetti
description: Basic spaghetti dish that serves a family of 4, only 4 ingredients required and instructions are basic and easy to follow.
steps: Bring water inside pot to a boil

name: tacos
description: Basic taco dish, feeds a family of 3, only 5 ingredients, the shells should combine to become 1 ingredient because there are 2 variants. This recipe is very straightforward, you cook the taco meat, and then once its fully cooked, you place it inside the hard/soft shell, and then add toppings, and the dish is complete.
steps: Cook meat until thoroughly and properly cooked

name: hamburger
steps: Put hamburger bun in toaster, and toast lightly
Put patties on grill to cook
Retrieve bun and place patty between buns
